title: Marandhu Poche Lyrics Meaning | With Love
stanzas:
Marandhu poche marandhu poche
Nenjam thudika marandhu poche
Irindhu poche irindhu poche
Kannil velicham irindhu poche

It is forgotten, it is forgotten
The heart has forgotten how to beat
It has turned dark, it has turned dark
The light in my eyes has turned into darkness


Nee pona paathaiyil naanum pogiraen
Nee sonna vaarthaiyil naanum vaazhgiraen
Un kaaladi thadam en nenjil vazhumae
Un punnagai adhu en uyirai kollumae

I am walking on the path that you walked
I am living through the words that you spoke
The imprint of your footsteps lives in my heart
That smile of yours kills my very soul


Oru murai ennai paarthu sirippaai ena
En vizhigal unnai thedi alaiyuthae
Oru sol ennai azhaippaai ena
En sevigal un kuralukkaga kaathirukuthae

Hoping that you might look at me and smile once
My eyes wander around searching for you
Hoping that you might call out to me with a single word
My ears are waiting for your voice


Nee illadha ulagam enakku vendamae
Nee illadha vaazhvu oru narakamae
Marandhu poche marandhu poche
Nenjam thudika marandhu poche

I don't want a world where you do not exist
A life without you is a living hell
It is forgotten, it is forgotten
The heart has forgotten how to beat


Kaatril un vaasam innum irukkuthae
Nilaavil un mugam innum theriyuthae
Kanalil un ninaivu innum eriyuthae
Manadhil un paasam innum vazhuthae

Your scent still lingers in the breeze
Your face is still visible in the moonlight
Your memory still burns within the embers
Your affection still lives on in my heart


Yen pirindhai yen tholaindhai
Ennai thavikka vittu engae ponai
Marandhu poche marandhu poche
Nenjam thudika marandhu poche

Why did you separate? Why did you get lost?
Where did you go, leaving me here to suffer?
It is forgotten, it is forgotten
The heart has forgotten how to beat
